abstract: Former Pres Bill Clinton defends his legacy in speech at William J Clinton Presidential Center in Little Rock, Ark; in trying to shape public perceptions of his record, Clinton is establishing foundation on which former Sec of State Hillary Clinton may run for president in 2016.
lead_paragraph: The speech came after a day of panel discussions at the William J. Clinton Presidential Library in which former White House aides discussed the former president’s foreign and domestic policies.

keywords.value: Clinton, William Jefferson, Presidential Library and Museum
keywords.name: organizations

byline.original: By AMY CHOZICK and PETER BAKER
byline.contributor: Amy Chozick reported from Little Rock, and Peter Baker from Washington.

headline.main: Bill Clinton, in Little Rock, Defends His Record With an Eye to Other Chapters
headline.print_headline: Bill Clinton, in Little Rock, Defends His Record With an Eye to Other Chapters

snippet: The speech came after a day of panel discussions at the William J. Clinton Presidential Library in which former White House aides discussed the former president’s foreign and domestic policies....
